title: AKS-Based Deployment Automation Framework
summary: Deployment automation templates for AKS using Helm charts, gated approvals, and environment-specific configuration.

title: CI/CD Governance Pipelines for Regulated SaaS
summary: Governance-focused CI/CD pipelines with scanning, artifact signing, promotion gates, and auditability for regulated SaaS.

title: Centralized Observability & Telemetry Layer
summary: Unified telemetry layer with tracing, structured logs, metrics, and cost probes for SaaS workloads.

title: API Gateway Architecture for Multi-Product SaaS
summary: Architecture for secure API gateway handling routing, throttling, RBAC, token validation, and lifecycle consistency.

title: Document Classification Prototype (NLP)
summary: Prototype NLP classifier for routing documents in lending workflows, reducing manual effort and improving consistency.

title: Rule-Augmented Risk Flagging Utility
summary: Hybrid rules + heuristic system used as a transparent pre-check before ML-based credit scoring.

title: Data Quality Validation Layer for Credit & Fraud Pipelines
summary: Reusable validation layer ensuring schema correctness, completeness, and temporal consistency for analytics pipelines.

title: DevSecOps Maturity Model & Assessment Toolkit
summary: Maturity model and assessment toolkit with rubrics, tiers, and best practices for regulated cloud SaaS teams.
